card.name: A Good Bit Laid By
card.text: Unique. Thorin specific. Playable on one of your Lordhavens [H] if you have stored at least two ore and/or treasure resources there. +3 to your GI. Your characters may play and make influence attempts here against any faction, as if at the site where the faction is normally playable: you must discard stored ore and/or treasure resources with a total mp value equal to the number of contiguous regions from this Lordhaven to the site where the faction is normally playable, minus 1 (resources worth 0 mp count as 1). After a successful influence attempt, a character in the company may tap to play a food item, which may be taken from your discard pile or sideboard.

card.name: A More or Less Decent Giant
card.graphics: A More or Less Decent Giant.jpg
card.text: Giant. Playable at any tapped or untapped non- Haven, non-Dark-hold site in High Pass or a mountain region, with a company containing a diplomat. For non-combat attacks his base prowess in considered to be 10. Only one A More or Less Decent Giant may be in a given company.

card.name: A New Domain
card.text: Balrog specific. Playable on a site where you have played Lord and Usurper. The site becomes one of your Darkhavens [K]. Additionally, Growing Shadow may be played on the region containing the site (or an adjacent region), regardless of any other requirements, and it is not discarded until this card is discarded. Discard this card if the site leaves active play. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: All This Dwarvish Racket
card.text: Each moving company with a Dwarf majority has its hazard limit increased by half the number of Dwarves in the company (round down fractions). Additionally, if Doors of Night, Eyes of the Shadow or Growing Shadow is in play, the hazard player may draw an additional card for every Dwarf with a mind of four or less in a moving company during the movement/hazard phase. Discard this card when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Amon Lanc
card.text: Dwarf-lord only. Playable during the site phase on Dol Guldur. Attacks against companies at the minion version of Dol Guldur are not cancelled as per the site card. You may tap a Dwarf or sage at the site to search your play deck or discard pile and take one Pass the Doors of Dol Guldur or manifestation of Thráin II into your hand. Additionally, if Return to Old Dwellings is played on the site, all versions of Dol Guldur become a Border-hold [B] and a Dwarf-hold. A character in a minion company may tap to discard this card after CvCC at the site. Discard this card if the site leaves active play.

card.name: An Evil Fortune
card.text: Balrog specific. You may play Breach the Hold on any Under-deeps site with an adjacent site that is a Dwarf-hold (as if on The Rusted-deeps). Additionally, you may play Invade Their Domain on any Dwarf-hold (as if on Iron Hill Dwarf-hold) with an adjacent Under-deeps site that has Breach the Hold played on it. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Arda Angered
card.text: The number of strikes and prowess of each Pûkel-creature, Rock Fall and Lava Flow attack are each increased by one (by two if Doors of Night is in play). Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: At Your Service!
card.text: Dwarf only. One influence check by a Dwarf is modified by adding half his mind value (round up). Negative modifications for his race are cancelled. Afterwards, if the check is successful you may remove one hazard permanent-event from the influencing character. Cannot be duplicated on an influence attempt.

card.name: Attack-lord
card.text: +2 DI against Dwarves with a lower mind and prowess. + 1 prowess against Orcs, Trolls, and Drakes. Cannot be duplicated by a given player unless he has Folk of Durin in play. tap: give +1 prowess to all Dwarves in his company against one attack (or in CvCC).

card.name: Attercop! Attercop!
card.text: Song. Playable on a Hobbit facing a strike from an Animal, Awakened Plant, Spider, or Wolf attack. The Hobbit receives +5 prowess against the strike. tIf untapped after the strike, he may immediately tap to face a strike already assigned to another character in his company. Any resulting body check after this strike is modified by +1.

card.name: Balin
card.text: Unique. Longbeard. Leader. +3 DI against Dwarves. +2 prowess against Orcs, Trolls and Wolves. -2 mp if eliminated. If you are Balin, values in brackets apply and your ore resources are worth full mp. If you have Lord of Dwarrowdelf and/or Reconquest of Khazad-dûm in play, you may keep one more card than normal in your hand.

card.name: Balin, Dwarf of All Trades
card.text: Unique. Balin specific. Place this card on Balin if he is in play. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to search your play deck for a resource requiring one of Balin's skills to play it and take it to your hand (reshuffle). tap: during your organization phase to look at three random cards from your opponent's hand. If any of these cards is a hazard creature playable at Balin's current site or the region containing that site (by type or name), opponent must place it on the bottom of his play deck. t

attr.value: Dwarves - 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against covert companies that do not contain an Elf)

Hidden Site. Tap a sage in the company to reveal this site. The Petty-dwarves faction may be played at this site. If a Dwarf at this site discards a Lost Knowledge card he controls, the site contains a hoard until the end of the turn.
Dwarves - 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against companies that do not contain an Elf)

Hidden Site. Tap a sage in the company to reveal this site. The Petty-dwarves faction may be played at this site. If a Dwarf at this site discards a Lost Knowledge card he controls, the site contains a hoard until the end of the turn.

Durang is playable at this site (as if at an Under-deeps site). Reforging may be played at this site by a Dwarf sage (as if Information were playable). Both these resources may be stored here (as if at a Haven [H]).
Items (minor*, major*, gold ring) * --battle-gear items only--

Once per turn, a Dwarf or sage in a covert company at this site may tap to shuffle one item with the word 'Dwarf' or 'Dwarven' in its card text or title from your discard pile or sideboard into your play deck (tap the site if untapped).

card.name: Battle-axe of the Fallen
card.text: Unique. Playable at Ruins of Belegost or Ruins of Nogrod if the company discards (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card it controls. Weapon. Axe. +1 EI. Warrior only: +3 prowess to a maximum of 9 (if borne by a Dwarf, +5 prowess against Spawn, Dragons and Drakes to a maximum of 11). Dwarf leader or Firebeard only: double the effects of The Dwarves Are upon You! for Firebeard Dwarves in the company.

card.name: Bears of the Carrock
card.text: Unique. Playable at Beorn's House or The Carrock if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: character with home site Beorn's House or Ligr Wodaize Berne (+3), Beornings (+2). Beorning Skin-changers cannot be played as an event against your companies. When you play Beorning Skin-changers as a creature, you may rotate this card 90° (or place a token). This faction gives +1 mp for each time rotated (to a maximum of 4 mp total).

card.name: Behind Doors of Stone
card.text: Playable on a Dwarf-hold if you discard (for no effect) a technology item stored at (or placed with) the site. Factions you have in play at this site are never worth more than 1 mp. Opponent's companies may not enter any version of the site and agents may not move to the site. The roll required to move between any version of the site and its adjacent Under-deeps sites is 13. Discard this card if Breach the Hold is played on any of its adjacent sites. Any opponent may tap three of his characters (or an avatar) at the site to discard this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Bilbo's Magic Ring
card.text: Unique. Ring. Manifestation of The One Ring. Playable at The Under-grottos if Gollum is not in play. May also be played after a failed attack from My Precious (instead of playing Gollum), if you tap a warrior, a scout, and a ranger in the company. +3 prowess, +3 body (to a maximum of 10), and +3 EI. +1 corruption point to every character in the bearer's company and/or at his site. You cannot play any resource that would allow you to win the game (e.g. A New Ringlord), except Gollum's Fate. This item may be tested as if a gold ring; discard when tested and make a roll to see which ring may be played: any unique ring (9+); any non-unique ring (any result).

attr.value: Dwarf-lord only. This site is a protected Lordhaven [H]. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled and you receive the SP. Characters with Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold as a home site may be brought into play at this site regardless of the presence of any other character.

card.name: Bolg of the North
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Bolg. Leader. Discard on a body check result of 9. +2 DI against Orcs. -2 DI if a manifestation of Rogrog or the The Witch-king of Angmar is in active play.+1 prowess against Dwarves and Elves. When Bolg of the North is at Mount Gundabad, you may keep one more card than normal in your hand, and all attacks against his company keyed to the site are detainment.

card.name: Bolg, Son of Azog
card.text: Unique. Orc. Manifestation of Bolg. One strike. May be played keyed to Gundabad and Dragon-gap; and may also be played at sites in these regions and at The Under- leas. Against a company that has faced a Wolf attack the same turn, Bolg, Son of Azog may also be keyed to Anduin Vales, Angmar, Forovirkain, Grey Mountains, Grey Mountain Narrows, Misty Mountains - Northern Spur, Northern Rhovanion; and to sites in these regions. One strike must always be assigned to the highest mind Dwarf in the company.

card.name: Borin
card.text: Unique. Firebeard. +1 prowess against Drakes and Orcs. Wound Borin to automatically defeat all strikes from a Trap attack against his company (no body check is required).

card.name: Born under the Mountains
card.text: Dwarf-lord only. All your cards worth mp and located at Under-deeps sites count for the purpose of calling your Day of Reckoning. Any Under-deeps movement roll for your companies moving to a site where a minion company is present is automatically successful. You may discard this card at any time to cancel a Rock Fall attack against one of your companies, or to give all your Dwarves at an Under-deeps site +2 prowess in CvCC. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Call of the Deeps
card.text: Playable on a company containing a greater or treasure item and a Dwarf majority, if moving to a non-Dwarf-hold, non-Under-deeps site. Opponent must replace the company's new site with a site from his location deck that is an Under-deeps site or surface site. The company must be able to legally move to this site (from their site of origin). If no such site is available, discard this card; otherwise, place it in opponent's mp.

card.name: Carc
card.text: Unique. Animal. Flying. Playable at any tapped or untapped non-Haven site in Northern Rhovanion. A Longbeard Dwarf may tap and play Carc from the discard pile. Place Carc in your sideboard to make Information playable at his current site in Northern Rhovanion, Southern Rhovanion, Iron Hills, or Dorwinion. tap: cancel a strike (not from an automatic-attack) against himself.

card.name: Children of Aulë
card.text: +1 body to all Dwarves in play. Additionally, all Under-deeps movement rolls are modified by adding the number of Dwarves of different descent (one for each type) in the moving company. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Clad for War
card.text: All your battle-gear resources are worth full mp, if you have at least three of the four types of battle- gear resources (armor, helmet, shield, or weapon) in play. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Clad in Chain-shirts
card.text: Command. Playable on a Dwarf leader during the organization phase. Return all other command cards on target leader to your hand when this card is played. -2 to leader's EI (to a minimum of 0). All Dwarves in his company receive +1 body, and +2 prowess against non-combat attacks (Traps, Rock Fall etc.). You may return this card to your hand during any organization phase. Cannot be duplicated in a given company.

card.name: Clan Bonds
card.text: Dwarf characters (even agents) may be brought into play at any Dwarf-hold where one of your companies is present. Additionally, Balrog of Moria is considered an at home Dragon manifestation for the purpose of playing and interpreting Legendary Hoard.

card.name: Crimson Hood
card.text: Unique. Helmet. Place this card on Balin if he is in play. +1 body to a maximum of 10. +2 EI against Dwarves. Balin may use Pipe as if he were Gandalf.

card.name: Crystals of Bilak-Khald
card.text: Ore. Playable during the site phase at Mines of Falek-dim or The Sulfur-deeps on a Dwarf or on an Orc bearing Miner's Pick. Tap the character. While on target character, make a roll during the untap phase; if the result is less than 5, target character must make a body check modified by +2. If target character is at a Haven [H,K] or Dwarf-hold, he or a sage in the company may tap to place this card with a Dwarven Light-stone, Goblin Earth-plumb or Noldo-lantern in the company. If placed with an item, any bonus the item gives is doubled.

card.name: Crossing the Border
card.text: Playable on a company that is not moving. This card creates an attack against the company, which is a duplicate of one automatic-attack of a site in the same or an adjacent region as the company's current site, or of an adjacent Under-deeps site (attacker's choice; cannot be a non-combat attack). If not in play, reveal the site from either location deck to establish the attack. The site must be a version which target company is allowed to use. Cannot be revealed as an on-guard card. Cannot be duplicated during a given movement/hazard phase.

card.name: Dáin
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Dáin II. Longbeard. Leader. +2 DI against Dwarves and Men. +1 prowess against Dragons, Drakes, Orcs and Trolls. -3 mp if eliminated. If you are Dain, values in brackets apply and your Man factions played at sites in Wilderland are worth full mp. If King under the Mountain is played on him, you may keep one more card than normal in your hand.

card.name: Dawn Comes Early
card.text: Environment. Playable on a Troll at or moving to a non- Under-deeps, non-Darkhaven site if Doors of Night is not in play. Target Troll makes a body check, modified by +1 for each Gates of Morning, Sun, or The Sun Shone Fiercely in play, and by -1 if he is wounded, is at a surface site, or is an Olog-hai or Half-troll. Failing this check wounds the Troll, or eliminates him if already wounded (treat a discard result as failing).

card.name: Dawn Take You All!
card.text: Ritual. Playable after strikes are assigned in CvCC (but before resolving strikes) on a sage in a company at a non-Under-deeps, non-surface siteC, if Gates of Morning is in play. Tap the sage. All unwounded Trolls at the same site are immediately wounded (no body checks are required); Half-trolls and Olog-hai are not wounded but tapped instead (if untapped) and receive -2 prowess until the end of the turn. Sage makes a CP modified by -2.

card.name: Deep Mountain Fortress
card.text: Dwarf-lord only. Playable during the site phase on an Under- deeps Ruins & Lairs [R] with a surface site that is not a Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D]. The company faces an attack: Drake - 2 strikes with 13 prowess (cannot be cancelled). Following the attack, tap your Dwarf-lord or discard this card. The site becomes one of your protected Lordhavens [H] and a Dwarf-hold and loses all automatic-attacks. Nothing is considered playable as written on the site. The site does not leave active play until this card is discarded. Discard this card if Invade Their Domain is played on any version of the site.

card.name: Desperate Strike
card.text: Warrior only. +4 prowess and -1 body against a strike; -2 to the strike's body. Cannot be played on a wounded character. After the attack, wound the character if not wounded (no body check is required).

card.name: Dís
card.text: Unique. Longbeard. May not be among the starting characters. +4 EI against Fíli, Frerin, Kíli, Thorin II and Thráin II. If she is at a Dwarf- hold during the organization phase, you may discard Dís and replace her with a manifestation of Fíli, Frerin, Kíli, Thorin II, or Thráin II; the character may be taken from hand, discard pile, or play deck (reshuffle).

card.name: Dry Tunnels
card.text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a moving company. If the company uses Under-deeps movement this turn, River cannot be played on the company's new site. Additionally, when The Way Is Shut affects the company make a roll: if result is greater than 7 the effects are cancelled. The Reach of Ulmo cancels any ongoing effect of this card.

card.name: Durang
card.text: Ore. Playable at any tapped or untapped Under-deeps site by a Dwarven Miner or Goblin-miner (or any character bearing a Miner's Pick). Discard this card at an Orc-hold to make Dark Forges playable. or at a Dwarf-hold to make Reforging playable (as if Information were playable at the site).

card.name: Durin's Crown
card.text: Unique. Helmet. Treasure. Playable at a Dragon's lair where an at home manifestation of a Dragon is in play (or has been defeated), or at Moria if a manifestation of Balrog of Moria is in play (or has been defeated). +1 body. +3 DI against Dwarves. If bearer is not a Dwarf, during the organization phase he must face an attack by a Dwarf character at his current site (if available; opponent's choice; as if CvCC between one-character companies). Place a stored Reforging with this item to restore it. If restored, values in parenthesis apply. tap: during your organization phase at a Free-Hold [F], Border-Hold [B], or Ruins & Lairs [R] to bring a Dwarf into play under bearer's EI. The character may come from your hand or discard pile. Bearer makes a CC.

card.name: Durin's Day
card.text: Unique. Dwarf-lord only. Playable on one of your Dwarf characters if he is the highest mind Dwarf in play. Return this card to your hand if a Dwarf with a higher mind is in play. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take one Dragon-lore, Dwarven Hoard, or An Unexpected Party from your discard pile to your hand.

attr.value: Hidden Site. Unless the company contains a Dwarf, it must discard a Lost Knowledge card it controls to reveal this site. Tap a character at this site to take one Ancient Stair, Legendary Stair, or The Iron-pit from your sideboard to your hand.

card.name: Dwarf-chopper
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Axe. Playable at Deep-cleft or any non-Darkhaven Under-deeps site. Warrior only: +2 prowess to a maximum of 9 (+4 against Dwarves to a maximum of 10). Leader only: +2 DI against Orcs. Orc with mind 7 or more: tap: during strike assignment to allow bearer to face all strikes from a Dwarf attack (as though he were a one-character company).

card.name: Dwarf-friend
card.text: Playable on a character at a Dwarf-hold (not a Dwarf, Wizard, Ringwraith or overt character). Target character receives +2 EI against Dwarves. He suffers no negative modifications according to his race when attempting to influence Dwarf factions. Additionally, target character is also considered a Dwarf for the purpose of non-environment, non-item cards and effects. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Dwarven Alchemist
card.text: Playable on a Dwarf sage or a Dwarf with a mind of six or more at a Dwarf-hold. Target character gains the sage skill. Cannot be duplicated by a given player. tap: and tap target character during the organization phase at an untapped Dwarf-hold to play one technology special item with a character at the site. Recipient need not tap to receive this item and it may be taken from your discard pile or hand. Tap the site.

card.name: Dwarven Armoury
card.text: Playable if you have at least two Dwarves in play. Place up to three of the following items under this card from your hand, sideboard or discard pile when you play this card: Dwarven Chain- shirt, Miner's Pick, or Shield of Iron-bound Ash. You may discard this card to place these items with any of your characters at the same Dwarf-hold (only one item per character; discard any unplaced items); you need not tap the characters nor the site.

card.name: Dwarven Art of War
card.text: Command. Playable on a Dwarf leader during the organization phase. -2 to leader's EI (to a minimum of 0). +1 to all CC by Dwarves in his company bearing a battle-gear item (+2 if a hoard item). You may return this card to your hand during any organization phase. Cannot be duplicated in a given company.

card.name: Dwarven Chain-shirt
card.text: Armor. Playable at any tapped or untapped site where you have successfully influenced a Dwarf faction or brought into play a Dwarf character this turn. May also be played during the organization phase (tap the site if untapped). +1 body to a maximum of 8.

card.name: Dwarven Cunning
card.text: Playable as a permanent-event on a site, if your opponent is not of the same alignment. Tap a Dwarf in your company at the site. The company must now face all of the site's automatic-attacks (if any). This card creates an additional automatic-attack at any other version of the site: Traps - 3 strikes with 9 prowess. The site does not leave active play until this card is discarded. Discard this card after its associated attack has been faced. Alternatively, playable as a short-event on a Dwarf: tap the Dwarf to cancel a Trap attack against his company or to discard Concealed Entrance at his site.

card.name: Dwarven Fire
card.text: Technology. Playable by a Dwarf sage at a tapped or untapped Dwarf-hold. If stored, you may discard this item at any time to create an additional automatic-attack this turn at any version of a Dwarf-hold site you have in active play: Lava Flow - 3 strikes with 9 prowess. Body checks for characters that do not bear any armor, helmet or shield are modified by +1. Only one Dwarven Fire may be so discarded on a given turn.

card.name: Dwarven Heirlooms
card.text: Dwarf-lord only. You may play a hoard minor item with a company at a Dwarf-hold after the successful play of a resource that taps the site (instead of a normal minor item). Additionally, if this is one of your starting stage cards, your starting minor items may be non-unique hoard minor items.

card.name: Dwarven Miner
card.text: +1 prowess against Orcs and Trolls. -1 to his CC. -1 to his influence attempts. +1 to his company's Under-deeps movement rolls. Unless it contains a manifestation of a Dwarf-lord, the company may contain only one Dwarven Miner.

card.name: Dwarven Warparty
card.text: Dwarves. Three strikes. Detainment against hero companies. May be played keyed to any Dwarf-hold or ancient Dwarf-ruin; and also to the regions containing such a site and to High Pass. If Hunting Orcs or The Watchful Peace is in play, may also be played at any Under-deeps site. If The Dark Days is in play, the attack becomes non-detainment against hero companies that do not contain a Dwarf or a Wizard.

card.name: Dwarven Axe
card.text: Weapon. Warrior only: +2 prowess (to a maximum of 7; +3 prowess if bearer is a Dwarf, to a maximum of 8). If bearer is a minion or overt character, this item gives 3 corruption points.

card.name: Dwarven Galleries
card.text: Dwarf-lord only. Playable if you have 5 P or more. Your stored To the Uttermost Foundations are each worth 2 mp. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take one Dry Tunnels, Gnawed Ways, Into Dark Tunnels, New Tunnels, or Secret Ways from your discard pile or play deck (reshuffle) to your hand. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Dworin
card.text: Unique. Ironfist. +1 DI against Dwarves. +1 prowess against Drakes and Orcs. tap: at any time to prevent Old Grudge from being discarded from play this phase.

card.name: Eagles Ahunt
card.text: Unique. +2 prowess against Dragons. Each overt company moving in Anduin Vales, Misty Mountains (Northern and Southern Spur), High Pass, and/or Redhorn Gate faces an attack (considered a hazard creature attack): Animals. Eagles. Flying - 4 strikes at 11/6 (attacker chooses defending characters). If Gates of Morning or The Watchful Peace is in play, this attack also affects Dunland, Enedwaith, Gap of Isen, Grey Mountain Narrows, and Wold & Foothills. Unless this attack is defeated, no character in the company may use cards requiring scout or ranger skill this turn, and any ongoing effects of such cards are cancelled.

attr.value: Dorwinion, Horse Plains, Sea of Rhûn, Southern Rhovanion

card.name: Expert Treasure-hunter
card.text: Hobbit. One strike. +3 prowess against Dragons. Attacker chooses defending character; all strikes of Expert Treasure-hunter must be assigned to the same character. May only be played against minion and overt companies, following a non-detainment Dwarf creature attack or at any version of a site where a hero company with a Dwarf majority is present. Make a roll for a successful strike instead of a body check (character is not harmed): discard an item from the company with a random number closest to the result (defender's choice if tied).

card.name: Fear of Kin
card.text: Playable on a Dwarven Ring, treasure, or greater item borne by a Dwarf-lord. The item gives two fewer corruption points (to a minimum of one) and cannot be transferred during the organization phase. The Dwarf-lord receives 3 SP. At the end of the organization phase, if the Dwarf-lord's P total is greater than his mind, the highest mind Dwarf in the company (other than the Dwarf-lord) and any of his followers must split from the company: either of the companies must move to another site this turn. Otherwise, if there are no non-follower Dwarves in the company, the company must move. Cannot be duplicated on a given item. Discard if the item is stored.

card.name: Floi
card.text: Unique. Firebeard. +1 prowess against Orcs. -1 to his influence attempts. May tap to support a character in his company even if he is assigned a strike from the same attack.

card.name: Flooded to the Surface
card.text: Playable on an Under-deeps surface site. The hazard player may replace one of the site's automatic-attacks with one of the automatic-attacks of an adjacent Under-deeps site. Additionally, if The Reach of Ulmo is in play, any Animal or Drake creature keyable to Coastal Seas [C] may be played at the site. Discard this card if such an (automatic-)attack is defeated or when the site leaves active play. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Folk of Durin
card.text: Unique. Dwarf-lord only. Playable at a tapped or untapped Moria if Reconquest of Khazad-dûm is in play (or Mount Gundabad if Return to Old Dwellings is played on the site) and if the influence check is greater than 14. Standard Modifications: Longbeard Dwarf (+2), Lord of Dwarrowdelf Dwarf (+5)

card.name: Fortress Reclaimed
card.text: Playable on a site if Rebuild the Town or Hold Rebuilt and Repaired is played on it. This card overrides any conflicting hazards and/or resources. You may play at the site a faction (not a Dragon or Animal faction) normally playable at a site in the same region as target site (or region adjacent): the influence attempt is modified by -2. If you have played a faction here, an additional automatic-attack is created at any other version of the site: same type as the faction - 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment if the company is of the same alignment). Discard this card during your end-of-turn phase if the site is a Ruins & Lairs [R]. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Foundations of the Hoard
card.text: Unique. Thráin specific. Playable on Thráin. You suffer no reduction in item mp at the end of the game if these are more than half of your mp total. Additionally, you may tap a Dwarven Ring Thráin bears to satisfy the hoard requirement for any items played with his company this turn. Thráin makes a CC.

card.name: Frár
card.text: Unique. Ironfist. +1 prowess against Orcs. -1 to his CC. +1 to his company's Under-deeps movement rolls.

card.name: Frerin
card.text: Unique. Longbeard. +2 DI against Dwarves. +2 prowess against Orcs. +2 DI against the Blue Mountain Dwarves faction. Unless Thorin II is in play, King under the Mountain may be played on Frerin (as if on Thorin II).

card.name: Friendship of Old Renewed
card.text: Unique. Dáin specific. Playable on Dáin during the site phase at Thranduil's Halls. Dáin makes a CC modified by -3. Afterwards, tap Dáin and make a roll (considered an influence attempt against an Elf character), or take this card to hand; modify the roll by +3 if you have the Wood-elves faction in play. If the result is less than 14, discard this card. Otherwise, this card is worth 1 item mp for each of your unique factions in play at sites in Wilderland and its adjacent regions (to a maximum of 4).

card.name: Fungi
card.text: Food item. Playable by a Dwarf or Orc at any tapped or untapped non-Dark-hold Under-deeps site. If the company moves with Under-deeps movement, discard Fungi at the end of the movement/hazard phase to immediately take another movement/hazard phase; you may untap one character in the company.

card.name: Galion
card.text: Unique. Silvan. tap: bring one Old Winyards from your discard pile to your play deck and shuffle.

card.name: Gandalf's Staff
card.text: Unique. Playable on a staff borne by Gandalf. Discard if the staff is not borne by Gandalf. Gandalf makes a CP when this card taps. tap: at the end of the organization phase to reduce the hazard limit for Gandalf's company by 1 (to a minimum of 2) if moving to a new site this turn. tap: at any time to give +2 to Gandalf's prowess and body against a strike.

attr.value: Ancient Dwarf-ruin. After you have successfully played Tower Raided on this site, you may take one Fortress Reclaimed or Rebuild the Town from your sideboard to your hand.
Orcs -- 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against overt companies);

Ancient Dwarf-ruin. Non-Nazgûl creatures attack normally at this site, not as detainment. During the site phase, an Orc leader at the site may tap to discard one Profitable Trade in play with factions in Wilderland (factions remain in play).

card.name: Gimli's Axe
card.text: Unique. Playable on a Dwarven Axe borne by Gimli. +1 to Gimli's prowess. You may always assign strikes to Gimli regardless of his status. Discard if the Dwarven Axe is not borne by Gimli.

card.name: Gimli, Son of Gloin
card.text: Unique. Longbeard. Manifestation of Gimli. +1 prowess against Orcs. +1 prowess when Hunting Orcs is in play (+2 if an Elf is in his company).

card.name: Glades of Flowering Stone
card.text: Unique. Dwarf-lord only. Playable on The Gem-deeps if you have a Dwarf-lord there and if Glittering Caves or The Gem-deeps is a Haven [H] or Border-hold [B]. You may place any of your Dwarf characters here off to the side with this card. Characters (and any cards they control) placed with this card are not worth any mp; you may bring them into play at The Gem-deeps as if from hand. The site does not leave active play while there is a Dwarf with this card. For every two Dwarves placed with it, this card is worth 1 faction mp (to a maximum of 4) and the prowess and strikes of automatic-attacks and attacks keyed to the site are reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

card.name: Goblin-basher
card.text: Unique. Grey agent. Manifestation of Beorn. +2 prowess against Orcs. -1 to all of his CC. Agent only: may attack an overt company at a Shadow-hold [S] (the attack is not detainment). If an Orc, Wolf, or Animal hazard creature is played against a company at or moving to a site in the same region as his current site (or region adjacent), you may automatically transfer Goblin-basher to this site (even if you have the site in active play).

card.name: Gollum's Cave
card.text: Playable on a (grey) agent at an Under-deeps surface site. The agent may use Under-deeps movement (as an agent action; no movement roll required). If target agent is My Precious, he receives +2 prowess while at an Under-deeps site. If this card is in your discard pile, you may play it as if it were in your hand.

card.name: Great Achievement
card.text: Place this card on your avatar if he is in play. If this card is on your avatar and you receive any mp for one of the following resources, place it with that card; Clean the Greenwood, Fate of the Ithil-stone, Into the Smoking Cone, King under the Mountain, Reconquest of Khazad-dûm, Pass the Doors of Dol Guldur, Rescue Prisoners, Towers Destroyed, or Tower Raided. Target resource is now worth full mp, and this card gives 1 mp. Discard if target resource is discarded. Cannot be duplicated for each of the above named resources.

card.name: Great Miners
card.text: Dwarf-lord only. Playable if you have 5 SP or more. You may play Delver's Harvest and Earth-eater at any of your Under-deeps Dwarf-holds (as if at the Deep Mines site). Additionally, your Map to Mithril, Mithril, The Arkenstone, Gems of Arda, Vein of Arda, or any other ore resource in active play are each worth full mp. If you have stored at least 3 different of such cards, this card is worth 2 mp. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Halls of Khazad-dûm
card.text: Playable during the site phase on Moria, if you have Return to Old Dwellings in play there and a company containing a Dwarf majority. The company faces 3 attacks (cannot be cancelled): Orcs - 5 strikes with 8 prowess; Orcs - 3 strikes with 11 prowess; Troll - 1 strike with 14 prowess; Following these attacks, tTatap a Dwarf with mind 5 or more in the company or discard this card. Discard any Invade Their Domain played on Moria. Moria becomes a Border-hold [B]. Discard this card if Invade Their Domain is played successfully on Moria, or if the site leaves active play. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Hard to Tame
card.text: Corruption. Playable on a treasure or ring special item borne by a Dwarf. The item gives two fewer corruption points (to a minimum of one). The hazard player may tap this card (costing one against the hazard limit) to take one Greed, Covetous Thoughts, or Grasping and Ungracious from his discard pile to his hand. Covetous Thoughts may be played on any Dwarf in the company (except the bearer of target item). Discard this card if there are no Dwarves in the company. Cannot be duplicated on a given item.

card.name: Hermit Troll
card.text: Troll. One strike. If revealed as an on-guard creature, attacker chooses defending characters. May also be played at a Ruins & Lairs [R] that has at least two Wildernesses [w] or one Desert [e] in its site path or that is in a mountain region.

card.name: His Beard Long and Forked
card.text: Playable on a Dwarf with a mind of five or more (four or more if a Longbeard). Target character becomes a leader and may tap to untap a Dwarf in his company. You may start the game with this card in lieu of a minor item.

card.name: Hoard Gathering
card.text: Choose one of the following types when you play this card: hoard, ore, ring or treasure. If you have stored at least three different resources of the chosen type, this card is worth a third of the normal mp total of these stored resources (round down any fractions; to a minimum of 1; each stored resource may count only towards one copy of this card). This card is worth full mp to a Dwarf-lord player.

card.name: Hunting Orcs
card.text: Each player may take one Wondrous Maps from his sideboard to his hand during the end-of-turn phase. Additionally, Wondrous Maps can be played if the last region is a Dark-domain [d] or a Wilderness [w]. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Hurling Rocks
card.text: Any company moving in a mountain region or in High Pass, Redhorn Gate, Bosiri, Cleft of Goats, Clyan, Dragon Gap, or Narthalf faces an attack: Rock Fall - 2 strikes with 9 prowess. Additionally, non-unique Giant hazard creatures may be played keyed to these regions, and to adjacent regions if Arda Angered or Doors of Night is in play.

card.name: Ibûn
card.text: Unique. Undead. Dwarf. One strike. May also be played keyed to a Shadow-land [s] or Ancient Dwarf-ruin against a company containing a treasure item. May also be played at Bar-en-Ibûn, Cameth Brin, and The Worthy Hills.

attr.value: Special: Dwarf-lord only. This site is a protected Lordhaven [H]. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled and you receive the SP. Characters with Iron Hill Dwarf-hold or Barak-shathûr as a home site may be brought into play at this site, regardless of the presence of any other character.

card.name: Ironfists
card.text: Unique. Playable at Nurunkhizdín, or at Mount Gundabad if Return to Old Dwellings is played on the site if the influence check is greater than 11 Standard Modifications: Ironfist Dwarf (+3), Longbeard Dwarf (-3) tap: make a non-unique ore resource playable at the above named sites this turn.

card.name: Ironfoot
card.text: Unique. Armor. Place this card on Dáin II if he is in play. +1 body to a maximum of 10. tap: give Dáin +2 prowess against a strike from an Animal, Orc, Spider, or Wolf attack. tap: during the organization phase to take one Leg it Double Quick from your discard pile or play deck (reshuffle) to your hand.

card.name: Jewel-healer
card.text: Playable on a non-warrior or sage Dwarf at one of your Havens [H] (or in your starting company). Tap target character and a jewel or ore resource in his company, and make a CP: if still in play afterwards, a wounded Dwarf in the company may make a body check modified by -2 and (if still in play afterwards) heal from wounded to tapped.

card.name: Khazadshathûr
card.text: Unique. Helmet. Playable at Goblin-gate. +2 body to a maximum of 9. +1 DI against Dwarves. Dwarf only: Cancels all dark enchantments targeting bearer or any cards he controls. tap: +3 to bearer's prowess against a non-combat attack.

card.name: King of Seven Houses
card.text: Dwarf-lord only. Playable during the site phase on your Dwarf-lord, if he is at a Dwarf-hold and bears The One Ring. Up to 3 different avatar hazard manifestations which create an attack may now attack your Dwarf-lord's company (resolve separately; cannot be cancelled; 1 strike of each attack must be assigned to the Dwarf-lord). Opponent may play these from his hand, discard pile or play deck (reshuffle), or he may use events in active play (discard after the attack if not defeated). Afterwards, if your Dwarf-lord is unwounded, make a roll and add 1 for each King of Seven Houses you have in play. If the result is less than 5, your Dwarf-lord is eliminated; if greater than 8, you win the game. Only one King of Seven Houses may be played on a given turn. You may return this card to your hand during the organization phase.

card.name: King-spider
card.text: Spider. Traps. Before assigning strikes, opponent must call odds or even. To assign strikes, each character in the company makes a roll: if the result corresponds with opponent's choice, the character must face a strike (resolve the strike immediately). Attack or strikes of King Spider cannot be cancelled by general card effects (e.g. Ruse), but a scout may tap to cancel a strike he is facing.

card.name: King's Advisor
card.text: +1 prowess against Orcs. Unless it contains a manifestation of a Dwarf-lord, the company may contain only one King's Advisor. tap: take one His Beard Long and Forked from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: King's Judge
card.text: +1 DI against Dwarf characters. +2 DI against Dwarf factions. +1 prowess against Orcs. Unless it contains a manifestation of a Dwarf-lord, the company may contain only one King's Judge.

card.name: Kingdom of Old Restored
card.text: Playable on a site where you have defeated an at home Dragon manifestation or you have Return to Old Dwellings in play. +3 to your GI. The site become a Border-hold [B] and a Dwarf-hold. While you have a Dwarf at the site, rotate this card 90° (or place a token) during your end-of-turn phase. This card is worth 1 mp for each time rotated (to a maximum of 8), reduced by the number of factions (and cards played on these) any opponent has in play at sites in the same territory (or in an adjacent region) as target site. Discard this card if it is worth less than -1 mp, or if the site is a Ruins & Lairs [R]. This card is worth full mp to a Dwarf-lord player. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Knowledge of Arda's Treasures
card.text: Dwarf-lord only. Playable on a Dwarf-lord. If the Dwarf-lord bears a Dwarven Ring, it is worth full mp and you may play ore resources at his current non- Haven surface site (if that resource is normally playable at the adjacent Under-deeps site). Additionally, you may tap a Dwarven Ring the Dwarf-lord bears to take one ore resource playable at his current site from your discard pile to your hand. The Dwarf-lord makes a CC modified by +2.

card.name: Kori
card.text: Unique. Firebeard. Grey agent. +1 prowess against Orcs and Trolls. Agent only: May use Under-deeps movement. tap: if at a company's new site to create an additional automatic-attack at the site this turn: Traps - 2 strikes with 9 prowess. This is considered an agent action. tap: if at a company's new site to prevent that company from moving again this turn. This is considered an agent action.

card.name: Last of the Seven
card.text: Thráin specific. As a permanent-event, playable on a Dwarven Ring borne by Thráin. Discard if Thráin does not bear the ring. -2 mp and -2 corruption points for the ring. Thráin must make a CC during his untap phase for every other Dwarven Ring in play; if he fails, discard a character in his company (ignore any other effects). Cannot be duplicated. As a short-event, playable on Thráin if no Dwarven Ring is in play. +2 prowess, +1 body, +2 DI, and you may keep one more card than normal in your hand this turn. Thráin makes a CC modified by -2. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

card.name: Lipór
card.text: Unique. Longbeard. +2 prowess against Orcs. May play Knowledge of the Enemy at any site, if his company has faced an Orc attack that turn.

card.name: Lock nor Bar May Hinder
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on a company with a character controlling Rescue Prisoners. You may bring one character into play with the company, regardless of the company's current site, the presence of an avatar, or the one character per turn limit. The character may be taken from your hand or discard pile.

attr.value: Swamp. *Major items are only playable at the site if the company has defeated an Undead attack the same turn.
Swamp. *Major items are playable at the site if the company has defeated an Undead hazard creature the same turn.

card.name: Lóni
card.text: Unique. Ironfist. +1 prowess against Orcs. -1 to his CP. -1 to his influence attempts. tap: bring one food item from your discard pile to your play deck and shuffle.

card.name: Lord of Dwarrowdelf
card.text: Unique. Dwarf-lord only. Playable on your Dwarf-lord, if he is at Moria or its adjacent sites and you have 8 P or more. +5 DI against Dwarves. Your Return to Old Dwellings, Halls of Khazad-dûm and Reconquest of Khazad-dûm are each worth full mp (if worth any). Unless a manifestation of Balrog of Moria has been defeated, discard this card if bearer is at a site that is not in Redhorn Gate or its adjacent regions and or does not have Moria as adjacent site.

card.name: Lord of the Eagles
card.text: Unique. Animal. Eagle. Manifestation of Gwaihir. Flying. Three strikes. Attacker chooses defending characters. As a creature, may be played keyed to Anduin Vales, High Pass, Misty Mountains (Northern and Southern Spur), Wold & Foothills; and also at sites in these regions. May only be played against overt companies. If The Watchful Peace is in play, may also be played keyed to any non-Dark-domain region adjacent to one of the above named regions. As a short-event, bring Eagles Ahunt or one hazard creature with an asterisk (*) from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Lust for Treasure
card.text: Thranduil of Mirkwood specific. Playable if a ring or treasure item is in play. Reveal a treasure item from your sideboard and place it face down with this card. Opponent then places this card with a Dwarf-hold or site containing a hoard in Wilderland or its adjacent regions. The site card may come from either location deck (opponent's choice) and does not leave active play while the item is placed under it. Any version of the item may be played by any player at any version of the site (as if from hand and at the appropriate site). Keep this card with the item. If the item is stored, this card gives 1 mp to the player who has stored it. Cannot be discarded during the organization phase.

card.name: Mighty Was the Fallen
card.text: Playable on a company if a character from the company worth 2 mp or more has been eliminated this turn (not by a CC). Discard this card if the company contains less than 2 characters. Store this card when the company is at one of your Havens [H]; it is worth 1 mp. Cannot be duplicated for an eliminated character.

card.name: Miner's Pick
card.text: Weapon. +1 to the company's Under-deeps movement rolls. +1 prowess to a maximum of 4. A Hobbit cannot use this item.

attr.value: Wondrous Maps* (0), Ostigurth (5), The Under-courts (6), The Limestone-caverns (8)
Dwarves - 4 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment if the company contains a Dwarf majority)

Hidden Site. Tap a sage or avatar in the company, or discard a Lost Knowledge card, to reveal this site. Contains a hoard. *Any Wondrous Maps you have in play in Nurn or Horse Plains is considered a surface site of this site. Creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment.
Gaurblog Lug (0), Nurunkhizdín (7), The Rusted-deeps (8), The Sulfur-deeps (7), The Under-courts (8)
(1st) Undead. Dwarves - 3 strikes with 9 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Shadow-holds [S]

card.name: Mining Settlement
card.text: Dwarf-lord only. Playable during the site phase on a Ruins & Lairs [R] that is an ancient Dwarf-ruin or is in a mountain region. The site becomes one of your Lordhavens [H] and a Dwarf-hold. Nothing is considered playable as written on the site card. Attacks against your companies at this site receive -1 to prowess and strikes (to a minimum of 1). Discard this card when the site leaves active play, or after a Dragon or Spawn attack at the site. Alternatively, playable on a Dwarf-hold. The site becomes one of your Lordhavens [H]; if it is already a Lordhaven, the site is protected.

card.name: Mithrandir
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Gandalf. Playable on a non-overt company without avatar. You may play spells on the company as if on Gandalf (except True Fána): ignore any required CC. Discard this card when you play Sacrifice of Form: place Sacrifice of Form in your mp. Additionally, when the company moves to a Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D], opponent must reveal to you 3 hazards from his hand (or else his whole hand). Discard this card when Gandalf enters play or you have 10 SP or more. Invert this card during your untap phase; if inverted, discard this card at the end of your turn.

card.name: More Than Meets the Eye
card.text: Dwarf-lord only. If played as a starting stage card, your starting company may include Hobbits. Place this card on your Dwarf-lord if he is in play. +3 DI against Hobbits. You may play To Fealty Sworn at any site after successfully playing a Dwarf faction (as if at a Free-hold [F]). Additionally, during the organization phase you may bring a Hobbit character into play at his home site from your discard pile, if you tap either two Hobbits or four Dwarves in your company at the site. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Mornaugrim
card.text: Unique. Playable at Mines of Angûrath if the influence check is greater than 10. Standard Modifications: Dwarves (+3), overt and hero characters (-3), any one Orc faction in play at a site in Mordor or its adjacent regions (-3). This faction is worth 4 mp if you have a Dwarven Ring in active play. tap: take one Dark Forges, Reforging or The Iron-pit from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Mountaineer
card.text: +1 prowess against Orcs. -1 to his CC. -1 to his influence attempts. Unless it contains a manifestation of a Dwarf-lord, the company may contain only one Mountaineer. tap: at the end of the organization phase to allow his company to move through a mountain region (and not stop at a site therein) that turn.

card.name: Náin, Son of Grór
card.text: Unique. Longbeard. +2 DI against Dwarves. +1 prowess against Dragons and Orcs. King under the Mountain may be played on him (as if on Dáin II). If he bears a treasure item: +1 to his prowess and body, and -2 DI. tap: bring one Songs of the Old from your discard pile to your play deck and shuffle.

card.name: Náli
card.text: Unique. Firebeard. +1 prowess against Orcs. -1 to his CC. -3 to his influence attempts.

card.name: Narin
card.text: Unique. Ironfist. +2 DI against Dwarves. +2 prowess against Orcs. +2 DI against the Ironfists faction. If Narin bears Dwarven Ring of Thélor's Tribe: +1 to his CC, he becomes a leader, and he gains the sage skill.

card.name: Naugol
card.text: Dwarves. Three strikes. +2 prowess against Orcs. Detainment against hero companies. As a creature, may be played at any Dwarf-hold or site where a Dwarf-lord is present; and may also be played keyed to the region containing such a site. As a long-event, Naugol gives +1 to strikes and prowess of any Dwarf attack created by Old Enemies, and it causes Ride Against the Enemy to give +1 to strikes and prowess of any Dwarf attack created by it. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Naugrim
card.text: All Dwarf attacks receive +1 prowess and +1 body; all Dwarf attacks with no body have 5 body. Discard this card when a Dwarf attack is defeated. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: New Tunnels
card.text: Playable on a Deep Mines site or on an Under-deeps Haven [H]. The Way Is Shut does not affect your companies moving to or from this site. At the end of the organization phase, you may reveal for a moving company at this site a Deep Mines (as an adjacent site; the required movement roll is 0). Place this card with the new Deep Mines site, as well as a surface site from your location deck located in the same or an adjacent region as the company's current surface site (or two regions away if you discard from play one Earth-eater). Target Deep Mines need not have a protected Wizardhaven as surface site to move there, and its surface site does not leave active play until the attached Deep Mines site leaves active play.

card.name: Ninevet
card.text: Animal. One strike. Attacker chooses defending characters. May also be played at any swamp or site in a Coastal Sea [c] region. If Terror from the Deeps is in play, may also be played at any Under-deeps site.

card.name: No Mouse Unnoticed
card.text: Unique. Balin specific. Place this card on Balin if he is in play. Balin may make a CC and (if still in play afterwards) look at a card placed on-guard at his company's site.

card.name: Norin
card.text: Unique. Ironfist. +2 prowess against Men, Orcs and Trolls. Swordmaster may be played on Norin as if he were a sage, and also at any Ruins & Lairs [R] (as if information were playable at the site).

card.name: Not Badly Off
card.text: Unique. Thorin specific. Playable if you have 10 SP or more, and you receive any mp for Hoard Gathering or have stored at least 3 major items at Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold. Each of your Dwarves with a home site Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold receives +1 to his CC and +1 mind; if such a character now has 3 mind, he gives 1 character mp and does not cost any influence to control.

attr.value: Dwarves - each character faces a strike with 7 prowess (detainment; cancelled if the company contains only Dwarves)

During the organization phase you may discard a treasure item from the company to bring into play a Dwarf with this site as a home site (regardless of his mind); the character may be played from hand, discard pile or play deck, but enough influence must be available to control him.
* Dwarves - 4 strikes with 10 prowess(detainment if the company contains a Dwarf)
*You may discard a treasure item from a covert company at this site to cancel the automatic-attack.

card.name: Oakenshield
card.text: Unique. Shield. Place this card on Thorin II if he is in play. +1 body to a maximum of 10. tap: allow Thorin to face a strike from an attack against his company, regardless of the attack's normal abilities or his status. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take one Block from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Old Enemies
card.text: Playable on a unique hero faction in active play. Each overt company moving through the region containing the site where the faction was played (or region adjacent) faces an attack: same type as the faction, with a number of strikes equal to the faction's normal mp. Each strike has a prowess of 10, and a body of 9 minus the number of strikes assigned. If the attack is defeated, the faction is eliminated (an overt character in the company may take the faction as a trophy). Cannot be duplicated on a given faction.

card.name: Old Grudge
card.text: All Dwarves in play receive +1 prowess against Orcs (+2 for Longbeards), Trolls, Drakes and Dragons (+2 for Ironfists). Discard this card when an attack of these types is defeated by a company containing at least one Dwarf. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Orc-archers
card.text: Playable on an Orc attack with at least four strikes (before strikes are assigned); does not count against the hazard limit. Each character in the attacked company must immediately face a strike with 6 prowess; he receives +1 prowess against this strike for each armor, helmet, and/or shield he bears. Afterwards the Orc attack is resolved normally.

card.name: Orc-tortured
card.text: Playble on a character facing a strike from an Orc creature attack. If the strike is successful, target character is not harmed and is taken prisoner at a Dark-hold [D], Shadow-hold [S], or Ruins & Lairs [R]. At the start of his untap phase, make a body check for that character modified by -1. Rescue-attacks (2): Orcs - 2 strikes with 7 prowess, Orcs - 1 strike with 10 prowess.

card.name: Orcish Marauders
card.text: Orcs. Two strikes. If all strikes against a moving company are successful, the company's new site is tapped.

card.name: Origin of Stone
card.text: Command. Playable on a Dwarf leader during the organization phase. Return all other command cards on target leader to your hand when this card is played. -2 to leader's EI (to a minimum of 0). +1 prowess to all Dwarves in his company and +1 to the company's Under-deeps movement rolls. You may return this card to your hand during your organization phase. Cannot be duplicated in a given company.

card.name: Out of Practice
card.text: Playable on a non-Hobbit character with two or more skills. Target character must attempt to move to a different site each turn or tap at the end of his organization phase. Once per turn during his organization phase, another character in the company may tap to attempt to remove this card. Make a roll: if the result is greater than 6, discard this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Pale Enchanted Gold
card.text: Hoard item. Treasure. Playable at any tapped or untapped site that contains a hoard. Discard this item to cancel a detainment attack by Elves or any one attack by Dwarves or Men against the company. Alternatively, discard to give +4 to an influence attempt against a Dwarf or Man character, ally or faction. Dragon-sickness may be played on the bearer of this item.

card.name: Pathfinder
card.text: +1 prowess against Orcs. -1 to his CC. -1 to his influence attempts. Unless it contains a manifestation of a Dwarf-lord, the company may contain only one Pathfinder. tap: cancel a Drake, Orc, or Troll attack keyed to Wilderness [w] against his company.

card.name: Pipe
card.text: Unless bearer is an Elf he may tap during the end-of-turn phase and make a CC to bring one Longbottom Leaf, Old Toby, Pipe Weed or Smoke Rings from your discard pile to your play deck and shuffle. If bearer is Gandalf or Saruman, you may take one of these cards to your hand instead.

card.name: Pipe Weed
card.text: Playable on a non-Elf character bearing a Pipe or with a home site in Eriador. Tap the character. You may look at the top five cards of your play deck and place them back on top in any order you choose. Character makes a CC (modified by -2 if a Hobbit).

card.name: Pit Trap
card.text: Playable on-guard at an ancient Dwarf-ruin or site with a Dwarf, Orc, or Trap automatic-attack. Reveal this card after the company has faced all automatic-attacks. Make a roll and add 1 for every scout and every ranger in the company; if the result is less than 13, the company faces an attack: Trap - 1 strike with 12 prowess, which must be assigned to the character with the random number closest to the roll's result (defender's choice if tied). +1 to the defending character's prowess for any armor, helmet, or shield he bears. Any resulting body check is modified by +1.

card.name: Pity Mixed with Horror
card.text: Playable on a character. Target character must make a CP for each corruption card he controls; after each successful CC discard the corruption card. This card may also be played as a hazard.

card.name: Pocket Handkerchief
card.text: May not be included with a starting company (unless it contains a Hobbit). Discard this item to cancel any effect that would return the bearer to your hand this turn (or would discard him, if bearer is a Hobbit).

card.name: Profitable Trade
card.text: Place this card in your mp. Any unique faction you have in play (except Animal, overt and special factions) may be placed with this card. If there is a faction with this card, any additional factions must have been played at different sites in the same or an adjacent region (or in the same territory). This card is worth 2 mp if there are at least 3 factions of different race placed with it.

card.name: Promise of Treasure
card.text: Playable on a non-avatar Dwarf in your avatar's company (or in your starting company). +1 to his mind and +1 to his CC. Additionally, each of your Return to Old Dwellings in play is worth full mp. Discard this card if bearer transfers an item to another character. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Ravens of Northern Rhovanion
card.text: Unique. Playable at any site in Northern Rhovanion if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: Carc or Roäc the Raven is in the company (+3). Longbeard Dwarves and characters with home site Dale or Lake-town may play this faction at a tapped site. tap: give +2 to an influence check against a hero faction playable at a site in Northern Rhovanion, Southern Rhovanion, Dorwinion or Iron Hills.

card.name: Reconquest of Khazad-dûm
card.text: Playable if you have Halls of Khazad-dûm in play. Balrog players must use the minion version for Moria. Invert this card if one of your companies has defeated a manifestation of Balrog of Moria: it is worth 5 mp and all versions of Moria become a Free-hold [F] and a Dwarf-hold; replace all automatic-attacks with: Dwarves - 4 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment against hero companies; cancelled against your companies). Discard this card if Halls of Khazad-dûm is not in play. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Restored to Its Owner
card.text: Playable on a hero item that can be stored at a specific site or hold, or that has a race specific bonus or ability. Target item may be stored at the mentioned site(s), or at a hold of the race for which it gives a bonus or ability; if stored there it yields mp as if borne by a character of the hold's race (even to a Lord-player).

card.name: Return to Old Dwellings
card.text: Playable during the site phase on an ancient Dwarf-ruin with an automatic-attack. The company faces all automatic-attacks again, with +2 to prowess and strikes. Afterwards, opponent may search his sideboard, play deck or discard pile for a creature playable at the site, which attacks the company. None of these attacks may be cancelled. After these attacks, tap a Dwarf in the company or discard this card. The site becomes a Ruins & Lairs [R]. All its automatic-attacks have their number of strikes reduced to one; discard any Invade Their Domain in play at the site. The site does not leave active play until this card is discarded. Discard this card if any opponent plays a minion faction or Invade Their Domain at the site. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

attr.value: (1st) Rock Fall - 3 strikes with 8 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Shadow-holds [S].
Ancient Dwarf-ruin. *Discard a Lost Knowledge card from a company moving to/from this site to give +7 to its Under-deeps movement roll.
Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold (11)*, The Drowning-deeps (11)*, The Under-caves (11)*
(1st) Traps -- 4 strikes with 10 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Shadow-hold [S]
Ancient Dwarf-ruin. *Discard a Lost Knowledge card from a company moving to/from this site to give +7 to its Under-deeps movement roll.

card.name: Shimmer of Hope
card.text: Playable on a company at an Under-deeps surface site which is a Ruins & Lairs [R], Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D]. The company may either move an additional region when moving this turn, or you may discard as many corruption cards from characters in the company as there are strikes in the site's first automatic-attack. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

card.name: Son of Dáin
card.text: Unique. Dwarf-lord only. Playable on Thorin III Stonehelm. He becomes a leader. +1 prowess against Men. If Dáin II has been eliminated, you may take this card from your sideboard to your hand and Thorin III Stonehelm receives +3 DI. If you are Dáin, Thorin III costs only 4 points of influence to control and may only be controlled by Dáin or GI. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take a non-unique Dwarf character from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Son of Fundin
card.text: Unique. Balin specific. If this is a starting stage card, one of your starting minor items may be Share of the Treasure. Place this card on Balin if he is in play. tap: during your your end-of-turn phase to take one Lord of Dwarrowdelf, Orc-mail, Return to Old Dwellings, or a non-unique Dwarf character from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Son of Nain
card.text: Unique. Dáin specific. If this is a starting stage card, one of your starting minor items may be Necklace of Silver and Pearls. Place this card on Dáin if he is in play. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take one Mining Settlement, Kingdom of Old Restored, Strength from the Ered Engrin, or a non-unique Dwarf character from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Son of Thráin
card.text: Unique. Thorin specific. If this is a starting stage card, one of your starting minor items may be Thrór's Map. Place this card on Thorin if he is in play. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take one King under the Mountain, Master of Esgaroth, Old Prejudice, or a non-unique Dwarf character from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Son of Thrór
card.text: Unique. Thráin specific. If this is a starting stage card, one of your starting minor items may be Lost Tome. Place this card on Thráin if he is in play. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take one Last of the Seven, Lord of Dwarrowdelf, or Test of Form from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Songs of the Old
card.text: Dwarf only. Song. Untap all instrument items in the company. Additionally, you may take an instrument item playable at the Dwarf's current site from your discard pile to your hand. If the Dwarf is at an Ancient Dwarf-ruin and bears an instrument, you may take one Dwarf only or Dwarf-lord only resource (not Songs of the Old) from your discard pile to your hand instead.

card.name: Strength from the Ered Engrin
card.text: Unique. Dáin specific. Attacks created by Dragon hazard manifestations against your companies at or moving to a site in Wilderland or The Northern Waste receive -1 to strikes, prowess, and body (to a minimum of 2) for each Dwarf faction you have in play at sites in these territories. Discard this card when you have defeated such a modified attack.

card.name: Swordmaster
card.text: Sage only. Playable during the site phase on a sage at a site where Information is playable. Tap the sage and the site. The sage gains the warrior skill. If he is already a warrior, he can use two weapons (or a two-handed weapon and a shield); both modifiers count. If he uses two weapons, he cannot use a shield. May not be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Ta-Fa-Lisch
card.text: Undead. Three strikes. May be played at any ancient Dwarf-ruin or site containing a hoard. Unless the attack is cancelled or defeated, place Ta-Fa-Lisch with the site. After an item is played at the site, place this card with the item. The bearer of target item faces an attack from this creature at the start of each of his movement/hazard phases (as if a single character company) until it is defeated, or until the item is stored or leaves active play (then remove this card from the game).

card.name: Tarin
card.text: Unique. Firebeard. Agent. +1 prowess against Elves. -1 to his CC. Agent only: tap: return one item or ore resource (of defender's choice) stored at (or placed with) Tarin's current site to opponent's hand.

card.name: Terror from the Deeps
card.text: Any Animal or Drake hazard creature playable keyed to Coastal Seas [c] may be played keyed to non-Desert regions adjacent to a Coastal Sea region (not adjacent to Mouths of the Anduin or Sea of Rhûn). Discard this card when such a creature played keyed to such a region (by name) is defeated, or when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: The Back Door
card.text: Non-unique Orc hazard creatures may be played keyed to any mountain region or region containing an Orc-hold; and also at sites in such regions. If Doors of Night or Shadow of Mordor is in play, they may also be played at any Under-deeps surface site.

attr.value: you may play Eagle Mounts here as if at Eagles Eyrie.
Animals. Bears - 2 strikes with 6 prowess (detainment against a company containing a character with home site Beorn's House)
Port-on-Anduin. You may play Eagle-mounts here as if at Eagles' Eyrie.
Port-on-Anduin. Lord of the Carrock may always be played at this site against an overt company, regardless of any other cards played or the hazard limit.
Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold (9), Remains of Thangorodrim (9), Ruins of Belegost (11), Ruins of Nogrod (11), The Under-vaults (9)
(1st) Drake - 2 strikes with 11 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Coastal Seas [c]
Any creature playable keyed to Coastal Seas may be played keyed to this site.
Iron Hill Dwarf-hold (8), Barak-shathûr (8), Mines of Falek-dim (8), Ruins of Kheledkhizdín (8), The Cobalt-deeps (8), The Wind-deeps (9)
(1st) Drake - 2 strikes with 11 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Shadow-holds [S]
Any Dragon creature playable keyed to a site in Wilderland may be played at this site.

card.name: The Seven Houses
card.text: Unique. Dwarf-lord only. Playable if you have in play at least 7 SP and two non-Longbeard Dwarves of different descent (e.g. Firebeard, Ironfist, etc.). This card is worth 1 mp for each of your Dwarf factions in active play. Discard this card if the conditions to play it do not exist. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take a Dwarf faction or a non-unique Dwarf character from your discard pile to your hand.

attr.value: The Wind Throne (0), The Cobalt-deeps (5), The Rusted-deeps (9), The Under-leas (6)
(1st) Orcs - 3 strikes with 7 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Shadow-holds [S]
Any Drake creature not playable keyed to a Desert [e] region may be keyed to this site.

card.name: This Cannot Be Borne!
card.text: Unique. Dwarf-lord only. Playable on your Dwarf-lord if you have in active play at least: 10 SP, 1 Dwarf faction, The Seven Houses, and 5 Dwarf characters. +1 to his CP. Invert this card during the site phase at an ancient Dwarf-ruin if the company has eliminated a manifestation of a Dragon or Spawn creature while at the site that turn. If inverted, this card is worth 2 mp, and the next influence attempt made by your Lord against a Dwarf faction or character, or against an ally or item controlled by a Dwarf, is automatically successful; afterwards, place this card in your mp.

card.name: Thorin
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Thorin II. Longbeard. Leader. +2 DI against Dwarves. +2 prowess against Orcs, Trolls, and Wolves. -3 mp if eliminated. If you are Thorin, values in brackets apply and your hoard items are worth full mp. If you have Reconquest of Khazad-dûm in play and/or King under the Mountain is played on him, you may keep one more card than normal in your hand.

card.name: Thorin III Stonehelm
card.text: Unique. Longbeard. +2 DI against Dwarves. +1 prowess against Men, Orcs and Wolves. If Dáin II has been eliminated, Thorin III Stonehelm is considered a Dwarf-lord for the purpose of playing and interpreting resources, and King under the Mountain may be played on him (as if on Dáin II). tap: take one All the Bells Ringing from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Thráin
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Thráin II. Longbeard. Leader. +3 DEI against Dwarves. +1 prowess against Dragons, Drakes, Orcs and Trolls. -3 mp if eliminated. If you are Thráin, values in brackets apply and your treasure items are worth full mp. If King under the Mountain and/or Lord of Dwarrowdelf is played on Thráin, you may keep one more card than normal in your hand.

card.name: Threat of Many Feet
card.text: Does not count against the hazard limit. Against moving companies hazard creatures may be played keyed to the site of origin (or the last site moved to this turn). Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Three Guesseses
card.text: When making a riddling roll, make three rolls modified by -2 and choose one of the results to use. May also be played during your opponent's site phase, if a riddling roll is called for.

card.name: Thulin II
card.text: Unique. Ironfist. +2 DI against Dwarves. +2 prowess against Dwarves. When in play as a hero character and not controlled by your avatar, make a roll during the untap phase; if the result is less than 5, discard Thulin II (one item may be transferred to a character in his company).

card.name: Tupór
card.text: Unique. Firebeard. +1 DI against Dwarves. +1 prowess against Orcs and Wolves. Túpor is considered a sage for the purpose of riddling attempts. You may take any resource played to modify a riddling roll in his company to hand instead of discarding it from play (it may not be used for the same riddling roll).

card.name: Value Food and Cheer
card.text: Playable on a character. Tap character if untapped. +2 to any rolls to remove hazards played on target character (+5 if you discard a food item from the company, for no other effect).

card.name: War Mattock
card.text: Weapon. Two-handed. Warrior only: +2 prowess to a maximum of 8 (if bearer is a Dwarf, +3 prowess against Trolls to a maximum of 9). This item is worth 2 mp if played as a hero resource.

card.name: We Must Away
card.text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a moving company that contains at least two Dwarves. Untap all characters in the company. The company may move an additional region this turn (to a maximum of 6). Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

card.name: What Have I Got in My Pocket?
card.graphics: What Have I Got in My Pocket.jpg
card.text: Riddling attempt. Playable during the site phase on a character at the same site as one of opponent's companies. Tap the character. Opponent chooses a character from his company for this riddling attempt. Each player makes a riddling roll, modified by +2 if his character is a sage and by +2 if a Hobbit (re-roll ties). The player with the highest result wins: he names an item (not a unique item already in play) and the other player reveals his hand. If the item is revealed the winner may immediately play a copy of the item with the riddling character from his hand, discard pile or sideboard (this does not tap the site); loser discards the revealed item.

card.name: Without a Glance of Longing
card.text: Playable on a company. Any CC made by characters in the company from attempts to play or transfer items, or from storing items or events are modified by +2 this turn. Cannot be duplicated on a given company in a given turn.

card.name: Wyrmsiege
card.text: Playable on a Border-hold [B] or Free-hold [F] (not in a Free- domain [f]). Place a non-unique Drake creature from hand with this card; the creature must be able to attack in regions in the site's site path or in the region containing the site. Companies at any version of this site must face an attack by the attached creature (considered keyed to the site) at the beginning of their site phase. At the end of the organization phase, a company at this site must make a roll and subtract one from the result for every non-warrior character it contains: if the result is less than 5, the company may not move this turn. Discard this card when the site leaves active play or when the attached creature is defeated. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.
